name: Demon's Souls - PS5
about1: In his quest for power, the 12th King of Boletaria, King Allant, channelled the ancient Soul Arts, awakening a demon from the dawn of time itself, The Old One.With the summoning of The Old One, a colourless fog swept across the land, unleashing nightmarish creatures that hungered for human souls. Those whose souls were stripped from them lost their minds â€” left only with the desire to attack the sane that remained.

name: MineCraft - PS5
about1: MineCraft is a sandbox video game developed by Mojang. The game was released by Microsoft Studios for Microsoft Windows and OS X on November 18, 2011. It was released for Android on July 9, 2015, for iOS on December 5, 2015, for Xbox One on November 10, 2016, for Nintendo Switch on March 3, 2017, and for PlayStation 4 on August 29, 2018.

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 - PS5
about1: Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War is a 2020 first-person shooter video game developed by Treyarch and Raven Software and published by Activision. It is the sixth main entry in the Black Ops series and the sequel to 2018's Call of Duty: Black Ops 4. Set during the Cold War, it was released worldwide on November 13, 2020 for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One, with a Stadia version released on November 19, 2020.

name: Astro Bot - PS5
about1: Astro Bot: Rescue Mission is a 2018 action-adventure video game developed by Traveller's Tales and published by Sega. It is the first game in the Astro Bot series. The game was released on October 17, 2018, for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One. A Nintendo Switch version was released on April 24, 2019.

name: FC25 - PS5
about1: FIFA 25 is a football simulation video game developed by EA Vancouver and published by Electronic Arts. It is the 25th installment in the FIFA series and was released on 27 September 2022 for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, and Xbox Series X/S. It is the successor to FIFA 21.

name: NBA 2K25 - PS5
about1: NBA 2K25 is a basketball simulation video game developed by Visual Concepts and published by 2K Sports. It is the 25th installment in the NBA 2K series and was released on September 18, 2022 for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, and Xbox Series X/S.

name: Top Spin 2k25 - PS5
about1: Top Spin 2K25 is a tennis simulation video game developed by Outright Games and published by 2K Sports. It is the 25th installment in the Top Spin series and was released on September 18, 2022 for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, and Xbox Series X/S.

name: Elden Ring - PS5
about1: Elden Ring is a 2022 action role-playing game developed by FromSoftware and published by Bandai Namco Entertainment. It is the successor to Dark Souls III and the second game in the Soulslike series.

id: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III
name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III - PS5
about1: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III is a first-person shooter video game developed by Infinity Ward and published by Activision. It is the sequel to Call of Duty: Modern Warfare (2019) and the 18th installment in the Call of Duty series.

name: WWE 2k24 - PS5
about1: WWE 2K24 is a professional wrestling video game developed by Visual Concepts and published by 2K Sports. It is the 24th installment in the WWE 2K series and was released on October 11, 2022 for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, and Xbox Series X/S.

name: Dragon Ball 2: Kakarot Tenkaichi - PS5
about1: Dragon Ball 2: Kakarot Tenkaichi is a fighting game developed by CyberConnect2 and published by Bandai Namco Entertainment. It is the sequel to Dragon Ball FighterZ and the second installment in the Dragon Ball Kakarot series.

id: The Last of Us Part II
name: The Last of Us Part II - PS5
about1: The Last of Us Part II is a survival horror action-adventure game developed by Naughty Dog and published by Sony Interactive Entertainment for the PlayStation 4. It is the sequel to 2013's The Last of Us and the second main installment in the franchise.

name: Cyber Punk 2077 - PS5
about1: Cyberpunk 2077 is an open-world, action-adventure RPG video game developed and published by CD Projekt. It was released for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One on November 19, 2020.

name: Avatar Frontiers of Pandora - PS5
about1: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora is a 2022 action-adventure video game developed by Lightstorm Interactive and published by Activision. It is based on the 2009 film Avatar and is the first installment in the Avatar video game series.

name: Suicide Squad - PS5
about1: Suicide Squad is a 2021 action film directed by James Gunn, written by John Ostrander, and based on the DC Comics antihero team of the same name. The film stars Margot Robbie, Viola Davis, Jai Courtney, Idris Elba, Joel Kinnaman, and Chris Pine.

name: Final Fantasy VII - PS5
about1: Final Fantasy VII Remake is a 2020 action role-playing video game developed and published by Square Enix for the PlayStation 4. It is the first installment in the Final Fantasy VII Remake trilogy and a remake of the 1997 original Final Fantasy VII.

name: Tekken 8 - PS5

name: FIFA 24 - PS5
